page.title: 18OLD SIRS FARM - DAISY HILL
page.content:
MY NAME IS RICHARD CLEARY. I AM TEN YEARS OLD AND HAVE LIVED AT{OLD SIRS {FARM}SINCE I WAS ONE. MEMBERS OF MY FAMILY HAVE LIVED AT THE FARM SINCE THE 1930'S.
THE NAME OLD SIRS CAME FROM 2 MEN NAMED{RICHARD AND WILLIAM LE SIRES. THEY LIVED IN WHAT IS NOW CALLED OLD SIRS IN ABOUT THE 12TH OR 13TH CENTURY. THE{BARN}AT OLD SIRS IS IN A STYLE COMMONLY BUILT AROUND 1670 BUT THE PRESENT HOUSE WAS BUILT AROUND 1800, WHICH MAKES THE FARM 200 YEARS OLD. IN 1813 A MAN NAMED GREEN LIVED HERE. HE SPLIT THE FARM BETWEEN HIS TWO SONS.
{FROM THE 1930'S}MY GRANDPARENTS OWNED THE FARM. AT THIS TIME IT WAS A WORKING FARM. (CONT ON P.19)
